callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key == "wh2_dlc16_wef_drycha" || PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key == "wh_dlc05_wef_argwylon", ( Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Count(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible) > 0 ) && ( PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount >= (Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Filter(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible).Transform( (comp) => comp.StoredContext("CcoUnitPurchasableEffectRecord") ).Sum(CostContext.TreasuryCost)) ), GetIf( PlayersFaction.CultureContext.Key == "wh_main_grn_greenskins", ( Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Count(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible) > 0 ) && ( PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("grn_salvage").Total >= Component("units", "main_units_panel").UpgradingUnitsContextList.FirstContext.PurchasableEffectsTotalPurchaseCost(Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Filter(IsVisible && CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible).Transform((comp) => comp.StoredContext("CcoUnitPurchasableEffectRecord"))).PooledResourceTransactionList.FirstContext.AbsoluteValue ) ) )

localised_text.tooltip_text: Spend [[img:icon_scrap]][[/img]] Scrap to purchase selected Upgrade.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key == "wh2_dlc16_wef_drycha" || PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key == "wh_dlc05_wef_argwylon", ( Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Count(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible) > 0 ) && ( PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount >= (Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Filter(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible).Transform( (comp) => comp.StoredContext("CcoUnitPurchasableEffectRecord") ).Sum(CostContext.TreasuryCost)) ), GetIf( PlayersFaction.CultureContext.Key == "wh_main_grn_greenskins", ( Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Count(CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible) > 0 ) && ( PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("grn_salvage").Total >= Component("units", "main_units_panel").UpgradingUnitsContextList.FirstContext.PurchasableEffectsTotalPurchaseCost(Component("list_box", "scrap_upgrades_parent").ChildList.Filter(IsVisible && CurrentState == "selected" && IsVisible).Transform((comp) => comp.StoredContext("CcoUnitPurchasableEffectRecord"))).PooledResourceTransactionList.FirstContext.AbsoluteValue ) ) )

localised_text.tooltip_text: Spend [[img:icon_scrap]][[/img]] Scrap to purchase selected Upgrade.

property.name: comment
property.value: Nick.L: we assume the only pooled resource for upgrades to be scrap; that's why I get the FirstContext

callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsContextValid(CostContext.PooledResourceCostsList.FirstContext) && Component("units", "main_units_panel").UpgradingUnitsContextList.Size > 100 #This component is currently not used.#
